instructions: Select the text . Don t include any trailing paragraph breaks or punctuation in your selected text. Tap Phonetics. (You may need to tap the Show More Items button until you see the Phonetics button.) A phonetic guide appears with the selected text. To change the phonetic guide text, tap Guide in the Phonetic Guide list, then select other guide text, or type your own in the text field at the top. Tap Close to apply the text and close the phonetic guide.

Select the word with phonetic guide text, then tap it. Do one of the following: Change the guide text: In the Guide Text list, select guide text in the language you prefer. The phonetic options presented depend on which keyboards are set up. Remove the guide text: Tap Remove Guide.
